name: Azer Forgemaster
description: The Azer Forgemaster is a medium elemental creature known for its affinity with fire and mastery as a craftsman, featuring a fiery aura and wielding a returning hammer.
memorable: Its Fiery Aura damages nearby foes and provides illumination while its ability to teleport through fire makes it a dangerous opponent.
goals: Typically crafts weapons and armor, controls territory using fire, and engages in combat.
relations: Related to other azer beings and may serve elemental patrons.
environment: Often found in volcanic or fiery terrains.
strengths: Immunities to fire and poison damage; capable of area control with its Fiery Aura and Bonfire ability.
attacks: Utilizes a magical Returning Hammer that can deal both bludgeoning and fire damage, and creates zones of fire with its Bonfire ability.
most_powerful_ability: Fiery Aura that damages creatures nearby while illuminating the area.
skills: Good Wisdom enhancing its perceptive skills.
additional_information: Can teleport instantly through fire with Fire Step.
Has a strong melee combat presence due to high strength.
Sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.
Can create a hazardous area with the Bonfire ability to control the battlefield.
Possesses a standard intelligence level, indicating basic tactical decision-making.
